pr_title: Taking config snapshot on deployment status updates. Setting unproces…

timeline.author: MikeDombo

replies.bodyText: This is being used to udpate the tlog, so that if cloud status update fails and device restarts, then device has the correct series of deployment status updates for the cloud.
replies.author: abanthiy

replies.bodyText: Is this trying to add deployment status updates to the rollback snapshot?
replies.author: hui-yang

replies.bodyText: Yes, I believe same is used when device restarts
replies.author: abanthiy

timeline.message: Taking config snapshot on deployment status updates. Setting unprocessed job to 0 when empty list received from AWS iot Jobs
